channel.title: Upgraded Discourse
channel.description:
Continuing the discussion from [Not getting post reply notifications](http://discuss.bootstrapped.fm/t/not-getting-post-reply-notifications/744/3):
[quote="andrey, post:3, topic:744, full:true"] @ian just took the box out back and smacked some sense into it. Things should be better now. [/quote]
I took it one step further and upgraded Discourse which hopefully has removed the dependancy that was failing. Please shout if you spot anything funky.

item.title: Upgraded Discourse
item.dc:creator: imsickofmaps
item.description:
It was always flat style, I think they’ve just added more grey boxes - If you want to change the CSS go ahead

Read full topic

item.title: Upgraded Discourse
item.dc:creator: andrey
item.description:
The updated version is all flat-metro-design? Everything’s gotta be trendy, huh? I liked the old version. Get off my lawn!

Read full topic

item.title: Upgraded Discourse
item.dc:creator: imsickofmaps
item.description:
Continuing the discussion from Not getting post reply notifications:

Not getting post reply notifications

@ian just took the box out back and smacked some sense into it. Things should be better now.

I took it one step further and upgraded Discourse which hopefully has removed the dependancy that was failing. Please shout if you spot anything funky.

Read full topic
